mapper.sql: ID, EMPLOYEE_CODE, FID, TMP_SIZE, VALID, TMP, TYPE,DELETED,BATCH_DATE, CRE_PRO_ID, CREATED_BY, CREATED_DATE, MOD_PRO_ID, LAST_MODIFIED_BY, LAST_MODIFIED_DATE
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM T_FINGER_FACE_TEMPLATE
ORDER BY CREATED_DATE ASC
mapper.insert:
SELECT S_T_FINGER_FACE_TEMPLATE.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
insert into T_FINGER_FACE_TEMPLATE (ID, EMPLOYEE_CODE, FID, TMP_SIZE, VALID,TMP, TYPE, DELETED,BATCH_DATE, CRE_PRO_ID, CREATED_BY, CREATED_DATE, MOD_PRO_ID, LAST_MODIFIED_BY, LAST_MODIFIED_DATE) values (#{id}, #{employeeCode}, #{fid}, #{tmpSize}, #{valid}, #{tmp}, #{type}, #{deleted},#{batchDate}, #{creProId}, #{createdBy}, #{createdDate}, #{modProId}, #{lastModifiedBy}, #{lastModifiedDate})
mapper.update:
update T_FINGER_FACE_TEMPLATE
EMPLOYEE_CODE = #{employeeCode},
FID = #{fid},
TMP_SIZE = #{tmpSize},
VALID = #{valid},
TMP = #{tmp},
TYPE = #{type},
DELETED = #{deleted},
BATCH_DATE = #{batchDate},
CRE_PRO_ID = #{creProId},
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy},
CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate},
MOD_PRO_ID = #{modProId},
LAST_MODIFIED_BY = #{lastModifiedBy},
LAST_MODIFIED_DATE = #{lastModifiedDate},
where ID = #{id}
